subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5156 is on the way
description_text:
Good evening guys,

I have recently received my HS Pro shifter, thank you!

The first time I used it, all gears worked properly.
This is my second time using it and R is not registering?
I have also tried calibrating in the Simsonn Manager App and R is not being detected at all

Can you please advise?

Kind regards,
Cameron

conversations.body_text:
Sorry to email again,

I've just noticed if I put it in 7+R and put it in reverse, it is registering as 7th Gear?


Kind regards,
Cameron
________________________________

Hi Cameron Turner,  Please use the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3, select 7R mode, and perform a full recalibration of all gears. During calibration, shift through the gears in the following order: 1 → 2 → 3 → 4 → 5 → 6 → 7 → R. Once calibration is completed successfully, the device will work properly and switch modes normally.
